case.name: Colonial First State Private Capital Limited, in the matter of Colonial First State Private Capital Limited [2007] FCA 1619 (24 October 2007)

citphrases.citphrase: application for order under s 411(1) of the corporations act 2001 (cth) that company convene meeting of its members to consider scheme of arrangement
deemed warranty that shares are free from encumbrances and that shareholders are entitled to transfer them held : order made

citances.sentence:
(second court hearing) INTRODUCTION
1 I have previously published reasons for judgment for orders that I made in this proceeding on 17 October 2007 ( Colonial First State Private Capital Limited, in the matter of Colonial First State Private Capital Limited [2007] FCA 1619).
